definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Much of the body's energy is wasted uselessly .
sentences.chinese: 多數的身體的能量就這樣白白浪費了。

sentences.english: She had lived blamelessly until she met this man.
sentences.chinese: 在遇到這個男人以前，她一直清清白白地生活着。

sentences.english: Even if Chu sword the finishing don't think Zhang behind the autumn, tin this opportunity slipped away for the pearly white.
sentences.chinese: 即使楚劍功不秋後算賬，可這機會就白白溜走了。

sentences.english: They were condemned to spend a fortnight of idleness at that longly island.
sentences.chinese: 他們被迫在那個孤島上白白浪費了兩個星期。

sentences.english: Well, at least that poor goat won't have died in vain.
sentences.chinese: 那樣，至少可憐的山羊就算沒有白白送命了。

sentences.english: Those questions should now be answered decisively.
sentences.chinese: 而這些問題現在到了應該明明白白地回答的時候了。

sentences.english: Have an aim in life, or your energies will all be wasted.（R. Peters, American jurist）
sentences.chinese: 人生應該樹立目標，否則你的精力會白白浪費。

sentences.english: I can't just let the water run to waste.
sentences.chinese: 我不能讓這些水白白流掉。

sentences.english: This is the teaching, full of sobriety, that Freud gives us.
sentences.chinese: 這就是佛洛伊德給予我們的教導，明明白白地。

sentences.english: He looked forward to starting life again with a clean slate.
sentences.chinese: 他期望清清白白地重新開始生活。

sentences.english: You should not idle away your time, but should make every minute count.
sentences.chinese: 你不該白白浪費時間，而應該把分分秒秒都利用起來。

sentences.english: I let the day slip away without doing anything at all.
sentences.chinese: 那一天我什麼事情也沒做，就讓日子白白溜過去了。

sentences.english: The baby is plump and very cute.
sentences.chinese: 那個嬰兒白白胖胖的，十分可愛。

sentences.english: I have never had a rap sheet and my record is clean.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有犯過事，清清白白。

definition: to be willing to/to resign oneself to
to lose one's life/to get killed
to pay for sth with the loss of (one's health etc)/to have sth come at the cost of (one's reputation etc)
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
to waste/to defile/to abuse/to insult/to defile/to trample on/to wreck/also pr. [zao1 ta5]
preferably/one would prefer to...(or not to...)/would rather/(would) be better to/(to pick) the lesser of two evils
valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
would rather.../it would be better.../would prefer
